_xResult.title: Custom Made Linen Trousers
_xResult.shortdesc: Sand colored custom made linen women's pants
_xResult.longdesc:
You've got to have a pair of custom made linen pants in your wardrobe, no matter where you live. And these sand-colored pants are perfection. The fabric, Hurley, is a light summer weight fabric that will dress up or down depending on what you match it with.

 

Sumissura is one of our most versatile brands - you can literally configure everything you want! But it can be overwhelming so that's why we are here to help. Just contact us to help you with the details that will make your pants 100% personalized to you. This product configuration is a popular one, and will suit most women's bodies.

 

Style-wise, their skinny design and sand color make them versatile for both in and out of the office. Add a blazer or suit blazer to instantly dress up for an important meeting, or wear them with a blouse for a more business casual look.

 

This configuration as shown:

  • Style: long length, medium rise, slim fit (skinny but not too skinny)
  • Flat-front, no pleats
  • Fastening: centered button
  • Pockets: diagonal front pockets, 2 back pockets (double welted) with button
  • Cuff: no pants cuff
  • Unlined (full lining is available for +$14.95)

 

Fabric: Hurley, 100% linen

Dry clean only
